ecommerce.name: Flask Marketplace
info: A modular marketplace in Flask with multiple stores

ecommerce.name: ShopCube
info: Ecommerce solution with cart, orders and anonymous buying

ecommerce.name: MarketFlow
info: Modular marketplace with multi-vendor option

power_frameworks.name: Quart
info: Python ASGI web microframework with the same API as Flask.

power_frameworks.name: Shopyo
info: SQLAchemy-first framework allowing you to have pure modules in Flask.
Supports some Django commands.

realtime.name: Flask-SocketIO
info: Socket.IO integration for Flask applications.

realtime.name: Flask-Sock
info: WebSocket support without gevent for Flask and other WSGI frameworks.

realtime.name: Flask-Meld
info: Meld is a full-stack framework for Flask that allows you to create reactive applications with no Javascript.

orm.name: Flask-SQLAlchemy
info: Adds SQLAlchemy support to Flask.

migration.name: Flask-Migrate
info: Flask-Migrate is an extension that handles SQLAlchemy database migrations for Flask applications using Alembic.

api.name: Flask-Rebar
info: Flask-Rebar combines Flask, Marshmallow, and Swagger for robust REST services.

api.name: APIFlask
info: Web APIs for Flask

api.name: Flask-RESTX
info: Fork of Flask-RESTPlus: Fully featured framework for fast, easy and documented API development with Flask.

api.name: Flask-Flasgger
info: Flasgger is a Flask extension to extract OpenAPI-Specification from all Flask views registered in your API.

api.name: Flask-Pydantic
info: Flask extension for integration of the awesome pydantic package with Flask.

api.name: Flask-Marshmallow
info: Flask-Marshmallow is a thin integration layer for Flask and marshmallow that adds additional features to marshmallow, including URL and Hyperlinks fields for HATEOAS-ready APIs.
It also (optionally) integrates with Flask-SQLAlchemy.

api.name: APIFairy
info: A minimalistic API framework built on top of Flask, Marshmallow and friends.

auth.name: Flask-Login
info: Flask user session management.

auth.name: Flask-Dance
info: Doing the OAuth dance with style using Flask, requests, and oauthlib.

auth.name: Flask-JWT
info: Add basic JWT features to your Flask application.

auth.name: Flask-JWT-Extended
info: Flask-JWT-Extended not only adds support for using JSON Web Tokens (JWT) to Flask for protecting routes, but also many helpful (and optional) features built in to make working with JSON Web Tokens easier.

security.name: Flask-Talisman
info: Talisman is a small Flask extension that handles setting HTTP headers that can help protect against a few common web application security issues.

security.name: Flask-Seasurf
info: SeaSurf is a Flask extension for preventing cross-site request forgery (CSRF).

security.name: Flask-CORS
info: A Flask extension for handling Cross Origin Resource Sharing (CORS), making cross-origin AJAX possible.
